snippet: Speculation quickly rose that Hezbollah fighters could have been targeted. The Nusra Front, an insurgent group linked to Al Qaeda, claimed responsibility.
abstract: Explosion on bus carrying Lebanese pilgrims to Shiite shrines in Damascus kills at least six people and injures 27.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD

lead_paragraph: Speculation quickly rose that Hezbollah fighters could have been targeted. The Nusra Front, an insurgent group linked to Al Qaeda, claimed responsibility.

headline.main: Explosion Kills at Least 6 on Bus of Lebanese Pilgrims Visiting Shrines in Syria
headline.print_headline: Explosion Kills at Least 6 on Bus of Lebanese Pilgrims Visiting Shrines in Syria
